sy: London's food scene has never been so hot! If you want topnotch dining you can't reach much higher heights then Oblix in London's tallest building, The Shard, or Duck & Waffle on the 40th floor of The Heron Tower, open 24 hours. If you want to keep things on ground level, enjoy brunch with a string quartet or cocktails at the trendy Shoreditch boutique Ace Hotel, or eat amongst world-famous Damien Hirst art work at Tramshed. You're in foodie heaven.
